trans-unit.source: Represents a dialog box for the workflow element.

The WorkflowElementDialog is a base type providing a set of methods and services that enable a dialog box to be displayed on the designer surface in a modal fashion in order to obtain input from a user.

Examples of this in [!INCLUDE[wf2](~/add/includes/wf2-md.md)] include the dynamic argument designer that enables dynamic arguments to be manipulated and the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch> case editor.
Custom activity designer authors are encouraged to use the WorkflowElementDialog rather than their own dialog mechanisms to provide a common way to handle this display.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the editing context associated with this dialog box.
Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.EditingContext"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog.Context*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether the maximize button is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the maximize button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether the minimize button is enabled.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the minimize button is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Enables or disables the **OK** button of the dialog based on the specified value.
The **OK** button is enabled if this is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, it is disabled.
Gets or sets the keyword used to display the F1 help topic related to the dialog.
Returns a<xref:System.String> that contains the keyword.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> associated with this dialog box.
Returns <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog.ModelItem*> dependency property.
To be added.
Raises the Initialized event.
Contains event data.
When overridden in a derived class, occurs when the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref> is changed.
The new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.Model.ModelItem"></xref>.
When overridden in a derived class, performs cleanup operations when the dialog is closed.
A Boolean value that indicates how the dialog was closed by the user.
Gets or sets the owner of this dialog box.
Returns <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyObject"></xref>.
Displays the dialog window.
Displays the dialog with **OK** and **Cancel** buttons and returns after the dialog is closed.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the user accepted the dialog; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if the user cancelled the dialog.
Gets or sets the title of this dialog box.
Returns <xref:System.String>.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog.Title*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets the resize mode of the window.
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.ResizeMode"></xref> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog.WindowResizeMode*> dependency property.
To be added.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a window will automatically size itself to fit the size of its content.
Returns a <xref href="System.Windows.SizeToContent"></xref> value.
Identifies the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.WorkflowElementDialog.WindowSizeToContent*> dependency property.
To be added.
